location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 67 to Rawson Hart Boddam, President and Governor, Public Department, Council at Bombay, from Edward Galley at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter records the arrival of the Morning Star. A summary of developments in Persia is given but it is noted that little new intelligence can be provided since no letters have been recieved from Isfahan. The letter gives the current balance of cash at Bushire and states that accounts for the previous month are enclosed with the letter (they are not contained in the file). Shipped by the Morning Star.
